title: Matchsafe, "Water Lilies", ca. 1900
markings: 10, unidentified mark, 800, flower, star 13, stamped on bezel
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular, curved corners and sides, featuring sinuous water lily and lily pad decoration that carries from front to reverse. Link attached to side below hinge. Lid hinged on side. Striker in recessed groove on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Water Lilies", ca. 1900.
ca. 1900. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-861.
